structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text:
All persons appointed as police officers pursuant to KRS 164.950 to 164.980 shall, at the time of their employment:
Comply with the requirements of KRS 61.300; and
Possess whatever other requirements as may be set by the governing board of the institution of public postsecondary education which employs them.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 4, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 367, sec. 3.
